panels.description:
UP - All nodes are running.
DOWN - All nodes are down.
DEGRADED - Some nodes are running.

targets.query: SELECT last(status) FROM "rabbitmq_cluster_state" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Cluster state

panels.description:
UP - telegraf pod is in a running state.
DOWN - telegraf pod is down.

targets.query: SELECT min("status") as min_status FROM "telegraf" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Telegraf Status

panels.description:
When memory use goes above the configured limit, then RabbitMQ will stop 
reading from client network sockets in order to prevent crashes.

targets.query: SELECT max("mem_alarm") FROM "rabbitmq_node" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Memory alarm

panels.description:
When disk space drops below the configured limit, then RabbitMQ will stop 
reading from client network sockets in order to prevent crashes.

targets.query: SELECT max("disk_free_alarm") FROM "rabbitmq_node" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Disk alarm

panels.description: The count of the messages available to the consumer.

targets.query: SELECT max("messages") FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Number of ready messages

panels.description: The count of the messages not routed to a queue.

targets.query: SELECT last("return_unroutable_rate") FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Rate of Unroutable Messages

panels.description: Number of client connections to RabbitMQ

targets.query: SELECT last("connections") FROM "rabbitmq_overview" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

panels.title: Number of connections

panels.description:
Number of messages that 
have entered the exchange and the number of messages that have left.

targets.query: SELECT max("messages_publish_in") FROM "rabbitmq_exchange" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND "vhost" =~ /^$vhost$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), queue, vhost fill(0)
SELECT max("messages_publish_out") FROM "rabbitmq_exchange" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND "vhost" =~ /^$vhost$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), queue, vhost fill(0)

panels.title: Messages Publish In/Out

panels.description:
Number of messages
 per second that have entered the exchange and the number of messages that have left.

targets.query: SELECT max("messages_publish_in_rate") FROM "rabbitmq_exchange" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND "vhost" =~ /^$vhost$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), queue, vhost fill(0)
SELECT max("messages_publish_out_rate") FROM "rabbitmq_exchange" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND "vhost" =~ /^$vhost$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), queue, vhost fill(0)

panels.title: Messages Publish In/Out Rate

panels.description:
Healthchecks checks that the rabbit 
application is running, that channels and queues can be listed successfully, 
and that no alarms are in effect: 0 - OK, 1 - Failed

targets.query: SELECT last("health_check_status") FROM "rabbitmq_node" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "node"

panels.title: HealthChecks (0 = DOWN, 1 = OK)

panels.description:
Declares a test queue, then publishes and consumes a message.
Shows what a time was spent on the smoketest.

targets.query: SELECT last("duration") FROM "rabbitmq_smoketest" WHERE "namespace" = '$namespace' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Smoketests

panels.description:
UP - Specific RabbitMQ pod has a running state.
DOWN - Specific RabbitMQ pod is down.

targets.query: select last("value") / last("value") as "value" from "uptime" WHERE "namespace_name"='$namespace' AND "pod_name"='$pod' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Status: $pod

panels.description:
UP - Specific RabbitMQ pod has a running state.
DOWN - Specific RabbitMQ pod is down.

targets.query: select last("value") / last("value") as "value" from "uptime" WHERE "namespace_name"='$namespace' AND "pod_name"='$pod' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Status: $pod

panels.description:
UP - Specific RabbitMQ pod has a running state.
DOWN - Specific RabbitMQ pod is down.

targets.query: select last("value") / last("value") as "value" from "uptime" WHERE "namespace_name"='$namespace' AND "pod_name"='$pod' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

panels.title: Status: $pod

panels.description: Pod uptime

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "uptime" WHERE "namespace_name" = '$namespace' AND "pod_name" =~ /^$pod$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

panels.title: Uptime: $pod

panels.description: Pod uptime

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "uptime" WHERE "namespace_name" = '$namespace' AND "pod_name" =~ /^$pod$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

panels.title: Uptime: $pod

panels.description: Pod uptime

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "uptime" WHERE "namespace_name" = '$namespace' AND "pod_name" =~ /^$pod$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

panels.title: Uptime: $pod

panels.description: CPU usage in millicores by RabbitMQ pods

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "network/rx_rate" WHERE ("type" = 'pod' AND "namespace_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^$service/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "network/rx_rate" WHERE ("type" = 'pod' AND "namespace_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^$service/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(null)

panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Network traffic by RabbitMQ pods

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "system_metrics"."network/rx_rate" WHERE ("type" = 'pod' AND "namespace_name" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^rmqlocal/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "pod_name"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "network/rx_rate" WHERE ("type" = 'pod' AND "namespace_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^$service/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(null)

panels.title: Network

panels.description: Memory usage by RabbitMQ pods

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "network/rx_rate" WHERE ("type" = 'pod' AND "namespace_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^$service/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "network/rx_rate" WHERE ("type" = 'pod' AND "namespace_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "pod_name" =~ /^$service/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(null)

panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Disk space consumed by RabbitMQ pods
panels.title: Disk space

panels.description: File descriptors consumed by RabbitMQ pods
panels.title: File descriptors

panels.description: Sockets consumed by RabbitMQ pods
panels.title: Sockets

panels.description: Delivered messages per second to the client

targets.query: SELECT mean("messages_deliver_rate") FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "queue", "vhost" fill(0)

panels.title: Deliver Rate

panels.description: Redelivered messages per second to the client

targets.query: SELECT mean("messages_deliver_rate") FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "queue", "vhost" fill(null)

panels.title: Redeliver Rate

panels.description: Messages published to an exchange per second

targets.query: SELECT mean("messages_deliver_rate") FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "queue", "vhost" fill(null)

panels.title: Publish Rate

panels.description:
Count of messages a queue has delivered with receiving 
acknowledgment from a consumer.

targets.query: SELECT mean("messages_deliver_rate") FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "queue", "vhost" fill(null)

panels.title: Ack Rate

panels.description: Memory - All memory was consumed by a queue. Memory RAM - Sum in bytes of messages stored in memory. Memory Persistence - Sum in bytes of messages written to disk.

targets.query: SELECT last("memory") FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "vhost" =~ /^$vhost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "queue", "vhost" fill(0)
SELECT last("message_bytes_ram") FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "vhost" =~ /^$vhost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "queue", "vhost" fill(0)
SELECT last("message_bytes_ram") FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/ AND "vhost" =~ /^$vhost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "queue", "vhost" fill(0)

panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Number of Memory Mnesia transactions

targets.query: SELECT mean("mnesia_disk_tx_count") FROM "rabbitmq_node" WHERE ("namespace" =~ /^$namespace$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "node"

panels.title: Number of Disk Mnesia transactions

panels.description: Number of Memory Mnesia transactions per second
panels.title: Number of Memory Mnesia transactions

panels.description: Rate of Memory Mnesia transactions
panels.title: Rate of Disk Mnesia transactions

panels.description: Rate of Memory Mnesia transactions per second
panels.title: Rate of Memory Mnesia transactions

panels.description: IO Read/Write average times
panels.title: IO Read/Write average times

panels.description: IO Read/Write average times per second
panels.title: IO Read/Write average times  rate

panels.description: IO Read/Write bytes
panels.title: IO Read/Write bytes

panels.description: IO Read/Write bytes per second
panels.title: IO Read/Write bytes rate

panels.description: Rate of Reclaimed Bytes
panels.title: Bytes Reclaimed

panels.description: Rate of Reclaimed Bytes per second
panels.title: Rate of Reclaimed Bytes

panels.description: Number of Garbage Collections
panels.title: Number of Garbage Collection

panels.description: Number of Garbage Collections per second
panels.title: Rate of Garbage Collection Number

list.label: Openshift project
list.name: namespace
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu/usage" WITH KEY = "namespace_name"

list.label: Vhost
list.name: vhost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "rabbitmq_queue" WITH KEY = "vhost" where namespace = '$namespace'

list.label: Pod
list.name: pod
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu/usage" WITH KEY = "pod_name"  WHERE "namespace_name" = '$namespace' and "pod_name" =~ /^rmqlocal/
